title: Google Searches for 'Good News' at All-Time-High in U.S.—Here Are 5 Uplifting Stories You Might Have Missed
description: Thankfully, it's not all doom and gloom at the moment.
content: Let s face itthere is no escaping hearing about the novel coronavirus at the moment Whether you re watching the news on television reading an article online or speaking to family members over the phone everyone is talking about it But to help distract y chars
